    • PACKET_POOL

      public static final ObjectPool<NetworkBuffer> PACKET_POOL
      Pool containing a buffer able to hold the largest packet.

      Size starts with ServerFlag.POOLED_BUFFER_SIZE and doubles until ServerFlag.MAX_PACKET_SIZE.
